UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: All-hydrocarbon stapling enables improvement of antimicrobial activity and proteolytic stability of peptide Figainin 2.
Literature.Author: Xue J, Fu Y, Li H, Zhang T, Cong W, Chu H, Lu Z, Yan F, Li Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=2.3µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=37.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=9.3µg/ml),Escherichia coli MG1655(MIC=37.5µg/ml)
